title: There is nothing wrong with the current ranked system

replies.body: From what I can see, there is nothing wrong in this instance. You lost because you had an afk, not necessarily a balancing issue.

> [{quoted}](name=JavelinJoe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QJFAhyBR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-21T21:33:39.485+0000)
>
> From what I can see, there is nothing wrong in this instance. You lost because you had an afk, not necessarily a balancing issue.

Even if Lucian didn't rage quit because he died once (report system works as intended btw), we still had an inting Mundo.

Losing LP because not 1 but 2 of my teammates are complete idiots is just dumb. And if you look at my match history you're going to notice that this happens in basically majority of the games I play(except that one game out of 40 I played in the last few dayswhere I was the inting retard).

Might I also point out, that was technically your best player :D 

I don't know if anyone has even caught that yet. 

but, Plat 5 is the start of that Tier, so your Golds 1 an 2 and your Plat Players would still be matched fairly, they could have been Plat but demoted do to monthly play time, suspensions, quit playing seriously . Looks to me the system is doing its job.

You won't be bothered by those guys again, unless you keep falling with them. _Just My2cents._

Again, this is nothing about any game aspect. This is entirely about shitty teammates. RIOT can only do so much. They can punish repeat offenders, but cant screen everybody 100% of the time. Sometimes good players have a bad day too.
Dying 11 times on Mundo should be a bannable offense to be honest.
